```css
// Property: format
// Description: Audio format to be used for the recording.
// Component(s): Ti.Media.AudioRecorder
'.format-audio-fileformat-3gp2': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_3GP2 }
'.format-audio-fileformat-3gpp': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_3GPP }
'.format-audio-fileformat-aiff': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_AIFF }
'.format-audio-fileformat-amr': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_AMR }
'.format-audio-fileformat-caf': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_CAF }
'.format-audio-fileformat-mp3': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_MP3 }
'.format-audio-fileformat-mp4': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_MP4 }
'.format-audio-fileformat-mp4a': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_MP4A }
'.format-audio-fileformat-wave': { format: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FILEFORMAT_WAVE }
```
